bill.title: Family Court; Service By Publication, Mail, and Posting
bill.description: Allows impoverished family court plaintiffs and petitioners to serve notice by posting pleadings at the courthouse in lieu of notice by publication, subject to order of the court, demonstration of a diligent search, and mailing of the pleadings to the defendant's or respondent's closest known relative. Effective 09/01/12. (CD1)
